STBLKeyStringList.Text: Oh no! It looks like {0.SimFirstName} has food poisoning! Something must have been wrong with that restaurant food. {0.SimFirstName} should get on the phone and let them know!

We're taking {0.SimFirstName}'s claim of food poisoning very seriously! Please accept {1.Money} as compensation for our mistake...\n\nTry drinking lots of water! Again, we're so sorry! Please don't tell anyone!

Owning a restaurant is hard work. Approximately 59.5% of new restaurants fail within the first year. However, with proper management, skilled employees, a delicious menu, and a little plasma, sweat and tears your restaurant just might succeed.\n\nFor more details, please check out the restaurant Ownership Lesson!
So you bought a restaurant. Now what?
Let me make up for any inconvenience you may have encountered and take care of your bill.
Your Simoleons are no good here. Enjoy the complimentary food.
You are such a valued customer. Let me take care of the bill for you.
Your meal is on the house. Please make sure to dine with us again.
Please enjoy a free meal compliments of the management.
Let me have the waiter bring you a complimentary dessert.
I can't let you leave without a smile on your face. Treat yourself to any dessert and I'll pick up the bill.
Thank you for choosing to dine with us today. Choose any one our fine desserts compliments of the restaurant.
Please try one of our delicious desserts. Free of charge!
Let me satisfy your sweet tooth and your wallet. Choose any one of our desserts for free.
I'm treating this table to a round of free drinks. May I recommend the water?
Let me have the kitchen bring out a free round of drinks so we can toast to your good meal.
Let me get a free round of drinks for this table.
Please enjoy a complimentary drink on us.
A good drink will improve your mood. A free drink will make it even better. Let me get you round of free drinks.
Your food will be out before you can say 'Gastronomy'.
I'm going to make sure your meal is top priority. It will be out shortly.
You are too important to wait. I'm going to make sure your food comes out pronto.
I'll go speed up your order in the kitchen. Your food will be out shortly.
I'm going to make sure the Chef turns up the heat to get your food out fast.
I could have grown and cooked my own food by this point. This is unacceptable. I'm leaving!
This is horrible! I didn't wait this long for my new phone on opening day. I'm out of here.

Genius is not a term I throw around lightly. This chef is a genius. Supported by an excellent staff. This restaurant presented me with dishes I'd never imagined and flavors I wish I had. I'll be making my next reservation as soon as I get home.\n\nDine here to take your taste buds to the next level.
The food was digestible but not the bill. It was clear I wasn't paying for great service either.\n\nDine here if you have Simoleons weighing you down.
I was unimpressed. The food likely had some nutritional value, but that is where the value ended.\n\nDine here if you just need sustenance.

Dining here was one of the most remarkable experiences of my life. It has opened my mind to what perfection could really be. The flavors of my meal will linger with me for years to come.\n\nDine here. It's not a suggestion, it's a mandate.

This restaurant is like a waking nightmare for my taste buds. The chef must've got ingredients that fell off the back of a truck into the mud and then were run over by 3 more trucks.\n\nDine here when you know the date will end early.

My stomach isn't empty and neither is my wallet. This is a so-so establishment that fulfilled the basic qualifications to be called a restaurant.\n\nDine here if you have a heart condition and must avoid excitement.
The cheerful staff went the extra mile to make my meal perfect. I recommend putting your trust in the Chef and ordering the Chef's Choice.\n\nDine here to experience what quality service should be.

The service and the décor are just the first insults to your senses. When the food hits your tongue it will grow legs and run for the door. Any price is too high for the meal you will get here.\n\nDine here if you like paying for the privilege of licking dirt.
It's hard to say if this restaurant is a glass half full or half empty. I guess it quenched my thirst.\n\nDine here if your favorite color is beige.
I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of meal I received for such a reasonable price. This is sure to become a local favorite.\n\nDine here to experience food done right.
{0.SimFirstName} has tasted the wonders of Experimental Food and now, understanding the complex flavors involved, can cook this dish at home using their personal chef station.
If only {0.SimFirstName} had level 5 Cooking skill {M0.he}{F0.she} could have learned to cook this experimental dish at home!
Additional Chef \n\nUnlocks the ability to hire one additional chef with the Manage Employees window. Don't forget to place a second chef station.
Additional Waiter #1 \n\nUnlocks the ability to hire one additional waiter within the Manage Employees window.

Additional Waiter #2 

Unlocks the ability to hire one additional waiter within the Manage Employees window.

This Perk is unlocked by the Additional Waiter #1 Perk.
Ingredient Discount (small) \n\nPermanently lowers the cost of ingredients by a small amount.
Ingredient Discount (large)\n\nPermanently lowers the cost of ingredients by a large amount. Requires the Ingredient Discount (small) to be unlocked.
The Chef's Hat \n\nUnlocks an additional Chef Hat for your Sims.
Fast Eaters \n\nCustomers will eat their meals faster.
Well Funded Foodies \n\nCustomers will more often choose the more expensive menu items.
The cost of ingredients is reduced for 24 hours.
Surplus Harvest (Temporary)\n\nTake advantage of a surplus harvest. The cost of ingredients is discounted for 24 hours.
Ingredient Quality Options \n\nUnlocks the ability to choose the quality of meal ingredients.
Inspirational Speech \n\nUnlocks the "Inspirational Speech" social interaction, which can be used to inspire your employees.
Patient Patrons\n\nMake customers easier to impress with quick service and willing to wait longer before they get upset at slow service.
Well Managed\n\nLowers the chance of bad events happening on the restaurant while your Sim is away.
Lower Employee Training Costs \n\nLowers the cost of training for employees.
The Meal Rush perk is currently active.
Meal Rush (Temporary)\n\nFor 24 hours, more customers will stop in to eat at your restaurant.

Curiouser Customers

Increases how often customers request dish recommendations.

This Perk unlocked by the Curious Customers Perk.
Curious Customers\n\nMakes customers occasionally wish for a recommendation on what to order from management and unlocks the ability to give recommendations through the "Recommend Dish" social.
The key to earning prestige is patience. Wait a while before attempting to manipulate your restaurant's repute.
Tidy Tippers\n\nCustomers will tip a bit extra on top of every meal. Can be purchased multiple times for ever larger tips!
Discussing the flavor profile of a recent food dish generates a series of ideas and thoughts to punch up {0.SimFirstName}'s own recipes.
This is some bold food. It's like a statement about life's inevitable end dipped in sauce and sprinkled with spices.
Wow! That was a gastronomically delectable dish. The emotions filled {0.SimFirstName}'s plate. It was magical and delicious!
A disaster of a dish with a side of terrible. {0.SimFirstName} is very displeased.
While the plate is a bit of a mess, it has something special about it that {0.SimFirstName} can't quite figure out.
Eating this food was like music to {0.SimFirstName}'s taste buds. The flavor was like a symphony of taste.
{0.SimFirstName} was so impressed with that dish! It was nearly perfect!
This food must have fallen from the heavens above. That is the only explanation that makes sense. Simply sublime!
It kind of tastes like plastic and makes strange sounds, but it's also a work of art! ART, I TELL YOU!
This experimental food is like art! Like wonderful, edible, great-tasting art!
This experimental food stuff looks weird and {0.SimFirstName} doesn't like it one bit. Not one bite.
The gurgling of the stomach is a deafening roar. {0.SimFirstName} must call the restaurant immediately to report this. But whatever happens, {M0.he}{F0.she} should not wander too far from a bathroom!
Surviving the storm was difficult, but now the stomach is stronger than ever before!
It makes a Sim feel really hip to have a bunch of cool photos on Simstagram.
{0.SimFirstName} has felt nothing as self satisfying as viewing a collection of photos curated by {M0.himself}{F0.herself}.
You've done your best, and this is truly a work of art.
Because taking {0.SimFirstName}'s favorite Sim out to breakfast is THE thing to do!
Dinner? Check! {0.SimFirstName}'s favorite Sim ever? Check! Everything is wonderful!
Taking {0.SimFirstName}'s favorite Sim out to lunch makes {M0.him}{F0.her} very happy!
{0.SimFirstName} believes that breakfast is the most important meal of the day! So why does {M0.he}{F0.she} have to cook it {M0.himself}{F0.herself}? As if!
Mmmmm... delicious. There's nothing like going out to dinner for a big meal. Those chefs can really cook!
Who wants lunch in a sack? That just sounds wrong! Going out to lunch is the only way to live!
Things seem to be going well for {0.SimFirstName}.
{0.SimFirstName} wishes someone would have told {M0.him}{F0.her} what the dress-code was for this place.
To have a functional restaurant, make sure a host, waiter, and chef have been hired. Also make sure a menu has been set for patrons to enjoy.
The restaurant is now open and customers are ready to arrive and eat delicious food!

Upon confirmation, your restaurant funds and the lot value will be deposited into your household's funds. If your restaurant funds are in the negative, it will be deducted from the value of the lot to clear your debts. The household will earn {0.Money} from this sale.
This meal definitely doesn't look too great...
Wow! Take a look at this! This meal is amazing!
I wasn't too happy with the owner...
All this attention from the owner is making me feel really special!
I'm not very happy about the wait times here...
Wow! My meal got here in no time!
I wish this place had more friendly service...
The service at this place is fantastic!
The decor here could do with some improvements...
Wow! This place has some nice decor.
Safety is my priority. You can count on me to hold anything up and light the way. I will not let you down.
That looks completely like edible art. Those chefs have some serious skill!
That looks so ridiculously delicious! It makes me want to eat my screen!
I saw that photo you posted. That food looks amazing!
You and I haven't always gotten along, but maybe we can become friends. What do you say to dinner at {3.String}?
You and I haven't always gotten along, but maybe we can become friends. What do you say to breakfast at {3.String}?
You and I haven't always gotten along, but maybe we can become friends. What do you say to lunch at {3.String}?
I'm really sorry to hear about your loss. Let's go get dinner at {3.String} so we can talk about it.
I'm really sorry to hear about your loss. Let's get breakfast at {3.String} so we can talk about it.
I'm really sorry to hear about your loss. Let's go out grab lunch at {3.String} so we can talk about it.
Heard you got a promotion, congrats! I think dinner at {3.String} would be the perfect way to celebrate. You in?
Heard you got a promotion, congrats! I think breakfast at {3.String} would be the perfect way to celebrate. You in?
Heard you got a promotion, congrats! I think lunch at {3.String} would be the perfect way to celebrate. You in?
I've been thinking maybe opposites attract. This might be crazy, but let's go have dinner at {3.String} and see if things get spicy.
I've been thinking maybe opposites attract. This might be crazy, but let's go have breakfast at {3.String} and see if things get spicy.
I've been thinking maybe opposites attract. This might be crazy, but let's go have lunch at {3.String} and see if things get spicy.
Hey, I need to get out of the house. Want to join me for dinner at {3.String}?
I'm starving! Wanna go grab lunch with me at {3.String}?
I'm starving! Wanna go grab breakfast with me at {3.String}?
I'm starving! Wanna go grab dinner with me at {3.String}?
Hey, I need to get out of the house. Want to join me for breakfast at {3.String}?
Hey, I need to get out of the house. Want to join me for lunch at {3.String}?
I can't get you out of my mind lately. Wanna go on a date and get some dinner at {3.String}?
I can't get you out of my mind lately. Wanna go on a date and get some breakfast at {3.String}?
I can't get you out of my mind lately. Wanna go on a date and get some lunch at {3.String}?
Move your fish into the Sea Plus Aquarium and see them thrive and grow. More swimming space and bubbles makes these fish the happiest water-dwelling creatures in captivity!
Your restaurant will never be complete until people know what it’s called. What better way than a fitting awning sign. It's Simply Advertising!

"Order's Up!" will be screamed out in delight at blistering speeds never before seen in a professional kitchen. This free standing chef station unit is a one stop shop that creates an efficient workspace for chefs of all shapes and sizes.

When the chef wants to hide behind a wall and only hand food through a small hole like pushing a tray into a prison cell, well then look no further than this beauty. Delivers all the grace and functionality of the most professional kitchen unit while still being able to hide even the most hideous chef in a back room.
Vanilla Sea Shells and Chocolate Caviar Simstagram Print
A perfect mix of the classic flavors. #TeamVanilla or #TeamChocolate
A bit beyond al dente but it works for this vegetarian dish. #JustBeetIt
A delightful departure from the flavor of raw bamboo. It was probably taken too far for the panda at heart. #Bamboozled
Glazed Heirloom Bamboo Roll Simstagram Print
Its tempting to build walls and structures with these little cubes. Don't forget to experience the taste. #PlayingWithMyFood
The chef's homage to the amazingly streamlined shape of the wild tuna. #OpporTunatySiezed
Cubed Ahi with Veggie Wasabi Matrix Simstagram Print
Sizzled Brisket over Sour Clover Salad Simstagram Print
Served without unnecessary humidity and bugs. #CulinarySafari
Jungle Moss Egg with Lavender Wisps Simstagram Print
A fresh sampling of the most skilled fish in the sea. #JustForTheHalibut
The flavor of these tasty shrimp leaps out and attacks the tongue. #CrouchingTigerHiddenFlavor
Tiger Shrimp in Smoked Dewdrop Broth Simstagram Print
The gels are concentrated fruit flavor balanced well with a neutral foam palette cleanser. #NestedFlavor
Spherized Fruit Gel in Foam Nest Simstagram Print
Delicate cups of veggie goodness, each celebrating its own flavor from the garden. #HiveFive
Honeycomb Garden Vegetable Cups Simstagram Print
Caution, can cause ice cream headaches without the ice cream. #IcebergAhead
Glacier Infused Iceberg Lettuce Simstagram Print
A single bite will take your mouth on a country holiday. #ReadyToPate
Rustic Pâté Drizzled in Aged Jus Simstagram Print
Flavor sealed in by the solar curing process really pops when bitten into. #EcoFriendly
Cured Meat Crisps on Reclaimed Forest Wood Simstagram Print
This dish will make you fall in love with bacon all over again. #SixDegreesOfCandiedBacon
Savory Bacon Love Petals Simstagram Print
Dreamt up by an astronaut that had enough of freeze dried food. #Eggstraterestrial
Space Taco with Pearled Egg Core Simstagram Print
The suction cups contain bursts of tangy flavor. #EatOrBeEaten
Free Range Sixam Pit Beast Simstagram Print
Fruit and honey are the best pairing to bring out the flavors of the finely sliced meat. #RazorThinMeats
Honeyed World Fruit Charcuterie Simstagram Print
Layer after layer of berry flavor. #BerriedUnderLayers
Melted cheese at just the right temperature to not burn your mouth. #UnbeLAVAble
The Short Curtain Classic will provide such minimalist shade that you may need more. Even if you don't, you will want to add more.
The Medium Curtain Classic will provide the perfect amount of shade that you will be content with just one.
The Tall Curtain Classic will provide so much shade that you might not realize it is day time.
It turned out much better than the Chef's signature dish, never mind that.

Nothing says "This is a place to eat!" like a sign which conveys that message. Showcasing your basic set of utensils, proper in any respectable establishment, this sign will tell your guests that no matter what they order, they can surely eat there.
Attract the type of customers who can appreciate and become passionate about a good meal. No holding back with this sign!
The story goes that this coat of arms was rejected by the Earl of Sandwich. His loss is your gain.
This sign can warm you up on a cold day. Without words it can communicate the tastiest dishes to your customers. There is no room for misinterpretation here.

A masterpiece created by renowned artist Madame Quick. This piece was inspired by a long list of negative people in her life (we think they were ex-party animals). The strokes represent the tired mornings and the late nights the artist endured.
This sign adds that extra fancy flourish and class to your storefront.
Guaranteed to not change colors and stand the test of time. Seriously...it will!
Steel load bearing beams were recycled to make this sign. We just hope that whatever building that had those beams doesn't need them...that would be bad.
This sign was constructed with only the most correct angles in mind.
This highly specialized dishwasher will make your dishes so clean you will be able to see your reflection in them. Use what the pros use and rejoice on your reflection!

What lies beyond these doors, we cannot really say. Will it be the place that your heart desires? The place which your stomach will grumble in anticipation? Or will it be the place you despise?\n\nIt is up to you and only you!
It opens. It closes. It opens again! Stainless Steel doors for the masses or, why not, your own personal wonderland dream kitchen.
{S.Butternut Squash Soup}{P.Bowls of Butternut Squash Soup}

The ways of the warming lamp were supposedly lost during the first age of Sims and the stories have been generally regarded as a fable ever since. Until the glorious day arrived from whence suddenly the Warming Lamp made a triumphant return! Heat thyselves in comfort!

You deserve the most out of your host. Not a little. Not some. The MOST! So check out this beauty and maximize your host's potential. Do it for the sake of the customers. Do it for the children. Do it for the world!
Classy, smooth, polished. All words to describe the ideal host also apply to this host station. Never settle for second best.
"Wood You Like to Sit" Host Station

Love that chandelier look, but don’t want to invest in a huge lighting piece that weighs a ton and can’t really take everywhere? A piece that you can have only one of? Say no more! The Just Like a Chandelier Light has all the wonderful visual components similar to a chandelier but in a smaller size so you can have more of them if you wish!

Its reflective particles will make your space the happening place!

Note: Blinding may occur. You have been warned.
An eclectic and elegant light piece that invokes wonder…and maybe hunger? It can look like a strawberry or is it more like a cheese ball?\n\nSee? It is also making you hungry! It is doing its job!
Light will go round and round with this rounded contraption, and it will also serve you as a decorative piece if needed. Modern, elegant, and functional!

It’s a light in a box!

For your celling...

It's a light in a box!
Seen originally in restaurants to create a romantic and cozy feel. This updated version will evoke those same feelings of romance and you will get points for giving it a modern touch.
It will keep the light safe, it will keep the light true.

You don't need to be a nature enthusiast to enjoy this cute little accent piece that will brighten up your Lot instantly. Be green chic with this delicate and luxurious bamboo inspired decorative piece and amaze your guests!\n\nNote: Bamboos may vary, pandas not included.

Coming in a gorgeous brushed metal or bronze finish, this light will impress all. Make no mistake - this is no first draft lamp. This is a polished, quality item that girl lights want and boy lights want to be!

Anyone can just grab a boring old bulb to light up a room. But for those with a more discerning taste look no further than the Modern Wall Mounted Light Bar. It will illuminate your life as well as your kitchen.\n\nDisclaimer: Results vary. Product may not illuminate your life.

This beautiful wall sconce emits light through a delicate filigree to perfectly create that soft lighting tone. It took 4 versions to perfect this design; previous iterations were known to catch fire, explode, have electrical issues, even cause death. But it's totally safe now. Really.
Where all the tasty dishes are listed.

The Catch of the Day Chalkboard is a great way to let Sims know special ingredients are cooking in the kitchen. Whether the catch is fresh fish, fresh vegetables, or meaty cows/pigs/chickens, these boards will cover it all. Just don't erase the pictures. It took a really long time to draw them.

The falling leaves perfectly represent change and movement in the world we live in. Symbolically speaking, time continues and the millions of leaves (Sims) flutter and fall with barely a sign from the universe that they even existed at all. Gosh, that's a bit sad really. But the colors are pretty.

Having trouble getting hungry? Well hang this on your wall and let the tummy grumbling commence! Just be advised: it is NOT recommended to actually eat this item. It is just a picture and should not be confused with real food. (The lawyers made us say this. One Sim chokes on a mouthful of canvas and suddenly WE'RE the ones to blame. Seriously, who eats a painting anyway?)

A series of images that focus on natural landscapes, old buildings, some familiar faces, and most importantly...stillness. Just glancing at the collection evokes a sense of calm gentleness. It's the perfect decoration to bring the serenity of the outdoors inside any room!

Ah, that first swirl of juice in the glass. The sound of it splashing to the bottom, the sweet aroma wafting purposefully up to the nose, the taste as it washes over taste buds… well you get none of that! It's just a picture after all. But it sure looks pretty.

An exercise in abstraction, this piece focuses on the harmonious aura generated by a perfectly set table as interpolated through subconscious aural resonance. (It's actually just a collection of multi-colored circles, but that description won't sell some units.)

Gilfred von Bonhomme was pondering his latest treatise regarding oil on canvas when he walked thoroughly into a protruding branch. Though his first reaction was one of rage, von Bonhomme soon saw that his transgressor was a beautiful, ancient blossoming tree. He immediately set forth painting it. Now, to celebrate the 100 year anniversary, we re-release The Branching Bloom print.
Contains all the pepper you will need.
Let your imagination and inspiration shine through color!

The plight of the distiller is one of flavorful production, then waste. Ancient oak barrels can only hold fine youthful liquors for so long before they peter out and are sent to the yards to decay and grow mold. Portles, the head distiller at Landgraab’s Stouts, shook his fist at the metaphorical waste and began planting lovely plants in his old barrels. “Waste not, want not, and grow hearty, my green pretties,” he is reported to have said.

These gorgeous, radiant, and rainbow defying fronds are the latest product of the best efforts of Chloro-physicists. They combine the finest and most vibrant colors in an unassuming package that delights children and terrifies certain birds.

Every Sim should have the agricultural capabilities to build their own tire plant. Now with the House Rubber Starter Kit, your household can experience the feeling of rubber without concerns of the actual rubber yield or difficult task of manufacturing tires. However, be warned! When burned, the House Rubber Starter Kit does reek of a low quality tire fire.

After years of daintily clipping locks and trimming whiskers, Cornelius Shear of Windenburg threw in his well-haired towel and dedicated his few remaining days to art and sculpture. While his first unsuccessful pieces focused on the affliction of male pattern baldness, his final, and most successful piece, took the famous stripe from barber shops, narrowed the top, and stuck a plant in it. Magnificent!

A dapper lass by the name of Winsome Jass spied a tree set to die with not a bird or a fly. She ambled to the tree, batted away a bee, and plucked its last berried branch. Into her satchel it was tucked! The tree died, ‘cus from the clouds water was not supplied, but the berry lived then, as it lives now, in The Berry End.

Although the original version of the Perfect Bloomin’ Poof was an artisan creation made by Sim hands, it was imperfect. Such is the way of the artisan. However, Perfect is in the name, and perfection is required. Therefore, enormous and terrifying robots were brought in to meticulously and perfectly shear the Poof until it appeared in a subdued, spherical pose.

Deep beneath the surface, numerous scientists reside without access to sunlight, air that hasn’t been filtered fourteen times, or good, modern television. Tasked with proving that life can exist in the outer reaches of space, these scientists have largely failed. However, one enterprising, lab coat adorned scientist invented the Scientific Sprout. Surprisingly, plant life can exist in any environment, as long as it’s in a beaker.
A great alternative during drought years when Water Lilies are hard to find.
A lively and chic alternative to decorate your walls and add a bit of life to your Lot. We are not sure of the species, but we think it is delightful.
Invented for the scientists working in liquid soap factories. Every rug now comes lemon scented.
The only vase that will do when you need to display a bouquet of 2 dozen sunflowers.
Where else would you store your 5 gallon tubs of mayonnaise?\n\nWhat? Mayonnaise not your thing? Oookey...
The room divider you can still pass notes through.
Bring the forest inside without all that pesky foliage.
A weight saving technique turned into a trendy new design.
Often replaced by dancing teenagers spinning handheld signs, this sign draws in customers with its more traditional approach.
Years of R&D, millions of Simoleons spent, and numerous interns were lost to bring you this technological achievement. It perfectly simulates a hole in the ground.

Do not underestimate this little menu. In a sea of queues, sticky menus and hard to read chalkboards, this little guy saves the day telling you exactly what you need to know. The information held by this small table menu can potentially save your life...I mean your day!
The perfect wooden platter to serve your guests or customers. Includes stainless steel pitcher and hand-woven cloth napkins to show them that you’re a proper host.
Ultimate olive fans will love this jar of salty fruit. That’s right, olives are fruit. The more you know…
The Spicebox Duo is the latest in spice-storage technology. Secure latches keep your spices fresh as the day they were harvested.
Kitchenwurx is the top provider of quality cookware. These pots are great for boiling, steaming, stirring, or simply being shiny.
This swanky cardholder is a great accent to your professional décor. People will think you’re important since even your cards need their own clothes.
A little salt, pepper, and proper napkins go a long way.

Guess how many peppers are in the jar.

If you guess correctly, you win!

Note: We are not sure what yet, but something!
This classy wall decoration is the perfect fit for any establishment looking to bring in fresh clientele.
Representing the oh so current design of the building this is placed on.
Unreadable to Sims under a certain age.

This sign is perfect for the place that prides itself in being niche and/or unique. Set your place apart from the rest by confusing your guests and have them asking "Excuse me, where are the forks?" as they peruse your menu realizing that most dishes will be a challenge to eat.
Stand out from the standard signs above the more common shops in the neighborhood.
Soothing bubbles are a great way to let your friends know that you’ve got cash and class. After all, you’ve got to be rich to afford that many bubbles.
A hint of color and shape to add pizzazz to the room. Perfect for those small spaces that you want to spruce up without making it look cramped.
Sliver of Color Short Wall Accent
Need more than a hint of color? Add this unique shape graphic to your wall to add pizzazz to the room.
Sliver of Color Medium Wall Accent
Really want to make a statement? Add a color and shape to add some (or a lot of) pizzazz to the room.
Sliver of Color Tall Wall Accent

When a plain wall just doesn't cut it, add some depth and flair with this.\n\nTake a long hard look and tell the world what you see in the depths of this adornment. Is it a flower? A torch? Let us know!

The ship's log records coming across a harbor master trying to sink the S.S. Medicine to make an artificial reef. He needed weight to help the ship sink that would leave no trace. The captain donated the stores of sugar to this task. It was recorded that the Schooner full of sugar helped the S.S. Medicine go down.
It is said that the lower shelf was only built so that there could be a top shelf.
The fancy all natural version of a wall socket air freshener.
Add to a rare steak and serve to dragons. What? No dragons? That is fine, you can still add to a steak or anything you fancy and feed your guests.
Just the right size to break up the hard angles in your standard room.
Staring at it for too long may result in a queasy feeling.
It almost feels like it will come crashing down on you.
If the salt tips and spills into the soup you only have your shelf to blame.
It can hold ten thousand types of spoons, but maybe all you need is a knife. Isn't it beautiful though? Don't you think?
Too heavy for the mischievous to run off with, this sign is here to stay. Look, but don't touch!

This blank sign is the perfect blank canvas to create a sign that truly expresses the essence of your establishment. Mix and match different colors, wall decals, and sculptures to create the sign of your dreams.
Ever wondered where those pesky menu handouts are? Never fear! This sign will not only display the specials, but itemizes the menu so well that you will never ask for a menu handout again.

Created by a Master Calligrapher who used the finest llama hair brush. It is said that when viewing this sign, the spirit of the llamas engulfs your senses, making you wonder what is happening in the Lot the sign is displayed on.\n\nNote: No llamas were harmed when making the brushes.
An accent of color helps distract customers from your prices.
Created from a repurposed fast food burger grill, this sign gives a new life to your walls with 100% less grease.
Made to display the most valuable menu items to passing pedestrians while securing them behind 2 inch thick shatterproof glass. This menu will survive any natural disaster.

This blank sign is the perfect blank canvas to create a sign that truly expresses the essence of your establishment. Mix and match different colors, wall decals, and sculptures to create the sign of your dreams.
The angles on this sign are pretty cute. That’s right.

This blank sign is the perfect blank canvas to create a sign that truly expresses the essence of your establishment. Mix and match different colors, wall decals, and sculptures to create the sign of your dreams.
A modern classic for when your washing needs go beyond the consumer level.

So retro. It will make you see in black and white.

Savalani's has done it again with this magnificent piece that just screams "blast from the past" even though it looks super trendy and modern. Savalani's vision for this stool was something that would make people wonder where it belonged.

Legend says that the idea was taken from the mind of Savalani himself as he perused his wardrobe on what to wear one morning.

A relic of an age long past, this particular style of booth is a frozen capsule of timeless elegance. One can almost picture the several generations of Sims sliding up close to their date to make a move!
The perfect booth for couples! This model offers the latest privacy technology letting you get up close and snuggly with that special Sim-one without all those pesky stares.
Straight Arrow High Back Plush Booth

Sometimes it's not prudent to sit directly next to someone at a straight booth. What would everyone say? The scandal! So yeah, it's probably best to sit right over there, bub! Across the table where I can see you.

Not just a booth, but a tale of woe and morality. With but a mere 90 degree turn, what began as a tale of a booth with a straight path to success becomes one in which a booth becomes twisted and crooked. There aren't many ups and downs in the storyline to be sure, but there are a few lefts and rights.

Another masterpiece by Savalani's, the famous furniture emporium. Its founder wanted to create a visionary chair that it is impossible to not sit up straight in...maybe? We guess. It looks deceptively simple, but it will be the best chair for great posture.

Made from the finest pleather by the famous furniture emporium Savalani's. Even though they call themselves a furniture company, Savalani's can only make chairs, ok maybe tables, no...chairs, only chairs for sure. It is said that this particular model came inspired by the founder's journey in finding the perfect chair to ponder about life or have a meal pondering about life. We can't really say, but it is a pretty nice chair suitable for all your fancy table placement needs.
This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. Playing more jazz subgenres than you knew existed.

Neatly pressed and placed for your everyday dining needs. This chic table can be used for holding your most important possessions or impressing your guests as if you were giving a 5 star dining experience. Just be careful and don't remove the cloth...just don't.
Do not be fooled by its appearance! This table can give your Lot the necessary ambiance to provide an excellent dining experience. Just don't try to wash the cloth...

If you fancy that industrial chic look, this is the table for you! The fusion of metal and wood gives extra support for those tasty meals. Also useful to display garden gnome collections, if you dare!

Having an event? Looking to spice your home with that formal dining room flair? This table is perfect for any occasion when you desire a little bit of something extra.\n\nNote: Cloth is not removable.

Be the envy of friends and strangers as they gaze into your dining room with this trendy and sophisticated table. Inspired by restaurants' communal tables, this table features a rustic design that can fit any style.

Metal and wood combine to make the illusion of a communal table on any Lot. Have an event or dine by yourself. All that matters is that this table would make your dining experience something to talk about. May it be what you were looking for.
The fusion of metal and wood comes together with precise angles to support the tastiest meals. Also useful to display garden gnome collections.
Bar Height Industrial Wood Square Table
The extra height works with bar stools so you can make sure all friends and neighbors can see this table. The point of a trendy sophisticated table is to draw the envy of friends and strangers.
Not A Communal Bar Height Table
Metal and wood combine to make the illusion of a communal table on any Lot - Now in Bar height! This table will serve many needs, but more importantly it will serve what you'll have for dinner.
May Be Bar Height Communal Table

Quite the statement piece if you are looking to wow and amaze your guests as they stroll down the hallways of your Lot - or if you are looking to make your abode look expensive without much effort. Beautifully crafted, its function is still questioned, but who cares? It is gorgeous!

Have your hallways help you exchange greetings in style. This hallway piece has a unique and intricate design that will have your guests wonder if someone can actually fit inside if opened the moment they walk in 'til the moment they walk out.

Need to place an order? Need more water? Need a menu? Need some plates cleared? Whatever your restaurant needs, this waiter station comes packed with all the modern technology to make the wait staff shine!
Add to a Half Wall for a polished look.
Add to a Half Wall for a polished look.

The Chef is currently working on an order.
All right, I'll get out of your way. Just let me finish up and collect my things.
The Chef is not available to talk right now! Come back later!
Oh, well thank you! You are a good customer.
Wow, how often do I get complimented! NEVER. Come back soon!
{0.SimFirstName}, you are the only one that understands my cooking! Thank you!
Customers are loving your cooking Chef! Keep up the good work!
The Chef is not available to talk right now. Come back later!
You want more bread!? It will be extra! You're pushing your luck, little Sim!
What did you say to me?! How dare you!
If you don't like it, then get out of my kitchen! The nerve!!
The customers are furious! What are you doing back there!? Pull yourself together and cook better food!
Your Sim needs to be sitting in front of a placemat to draw on it.
Here's your table. Enjoy your meal.
{0.SimFirstName} has already claimed a table. {M0.He}{F0.She} must Give Up Table before claiming a new one.
You liked the food, yes? Wonderful! I will let the Chef know how happy you were when I have a chance!
I'm sorry to hear that you didn't like the food. I will inform the Chef as soon as possible! Sorry about that!
Bemoan Lack of Banana for Scale
Beam Blissful Feelings of Food Transcendence

This is the current cooking style.
The chef will cook more slowly but produce higher quality meals.
A balance between cooking speed and meal quality.
The chef will cook more quickly at the expense of meal quality.
{0.SimFirstName} has hired a new chef. {1.SimName} will arrive for {M1.his}{F1.her} first shift as soon as possible.\n\nBe sure to track {1.SimFirstName}'s skills in the Manage Employees window.
{0.SimFirstName} has hired a new host. {1.SimName} will arrive for {M1.his}{F1.her} first shift as soon as possible.\n\nBe sure to track {1.SimFirstName}'s skills in the Manage Employees window.

{0.SimFirstName} has hired a new {M1.waiter}{F1.waitress}. {1.SimName} will arrive for {M1.his}{F1.her} first shift as soon as possible.\n\nBe sure to track {1.SimFirstName}'s skills in the Manage Employees window.
Choose a dish and/or beverage from your menu for your customer to order.
This Sim has recently been checked on.
Welcome to my restaurant. I trust everything is going well.
I'm stopping by to make sure this restaurant is living up to your expectations so far.
Welcome! I hope to hear you are having a great meal. Our Chef has some serious culinary talent.
I hope you brought your appetite. Let me know if you need a recommendation today.
Just checking in to make sure you are getting the service you need.
The Sim must have received their meal to comp their food.
This table's food has already been comped.
The restaurant will be charged the cost of the desserts.
The table has already been offered a free menu item.
The Sim must have received their meal to offer them free dessert.
The restaurant will be charged the cost of the drinks.
The Sim must have received their meal to offer them free drinks.
Prioritizing a table's food will help it come out more quickly.
This table's order has already been prioritized.
This Sim has already been recommended a dish.
Dishes can only be recommend to customers wanting a recommendation. These customers will have a question mark over their heads.
This Sim has already decided what to order.
This dish was made with a fresh shipment of the best ingredients. You are really missing out. Maybe come back and try it next time.
May I recommend the Chef's Choice. The Chef has crafted a treat for your tastebuds.\n\nNo. I hope the Chef doesn't take it too personally.
Try this dish. It's a recipe that has been handed down in my family for generations. I'll make sure the Chef cooks it to meet my Grandmother's standards.
You won't try this dish. It's a recipe that has been handed down in my family for generations. I guess it is something you have to grow up eating.
Our staff is loving the flavors brought out in this dish. We all highly recommend it! I see you would rather not trust public opinion though. Next time maybe.
Here is my recommendation. The fresh ingredients will provide a fantastic flavor, but I see you want something with a more aged taste.
This dish was made with a fresh shipment of the best ingredients. You won't be disappointed with this selection.
Our staff is loving the flavors brought out in this dish. We all highly recommend it! May I say you have excellent taste by accepting this recommendation.
May I recommend the Chef's Choice? The Chef has crafted a treat for your tastebuds. Quite the symphony of flavors!\n\nYes? Excellent! The Chef will be happy to hear that.
Here is my recommendation. The ingredients are fresh from the farm this morning. The fresh ingredients will provide a fantastic flavor.
This Sim has already been welcomed.

Fully Fulfilled Hanging Wall Sign Collection

Eat and Learn an Experimental Meal

Take a Photo of Experimental Food

Influences the quality of food. Difficult foods require high skill.
Influences the quality of drinks. Difficult drinks require high skill.
Influences customer reviews of the service when seated.
Influences customer reviews of the service when seated.
Influences how often a waiter may drop food while serving.
Influences customer reviews of the service when meals are served.
(From Requesting a Table at a Restaurant)
Your restaurant’s inviting décor makes it the talk of the town.
Try adding some nicer décor to your restaurant’s dining area. Make sure your restaurant is clean too.
Your customers are raving about the quality of food at your restaurant.
Try training your chefs to level up their cooking skills. Make sure they’re able to properly prepare your menu.
Your restaurant is known to offer food at great prices.
Try lowering your price markup, and make sure your chef is cooking food at a quality that customers expect.
What a fantastic owner you are! Keep up those personal interactions with your customers.
Try interacting with your customers more. They’ll appreciate the owner’s attention.
Your staff are renowned for their impeccable service. They’re always friendly and skilled at what they do.
Try training your Hosts and Waiters to level up their skills. Improving their moods will also improve their service.
Your customers love how quickly food comes out.
Try hiring more waiters or chefs. If food’s still taking too long to get to tables, rearrange your floor plan.

Your customers will be rating their dining experience from 1 to 5 stars. These rating will determine your restaurant's overall star rating which will go on to determine how many more customers will come to eat there.\n\nThe customers will be paying attention to the ambiance of the dining room, how well they are treated by the host, how long they have to wait for food, and more. Read the "Restaurants - Ratings" lesson for more tips on how to effectively keep your diners happy.

When you first arrive at your restaurant you'll be asked to transfer some funds to your business to cover basic operating expenses. To learn more about managing your money, read the "Restaurant - Funds" lesson.

You'll need a functioning restaurant before you can open the doors. This means placing and staffing a chef station, a waiter station, and a host station. You will also need to place at least 4 dining spots, a bathroom, and a sink. Next, you will need to customize your menu.

Sims can own and manage restaurants to earn Simoleons. To open a restaurant, use the Phone or Computer and select "Buy Restaurant." You can buy an existing restaurant, or purchase any unoccupied lot and start from scratch.\n\nA household can own and run multiple restaurants at the same time. Go ahead and try to create your culinary empire.

Check out the Owned Businesses panel in the bottom right hand corner. This is where you open and close your restaurant. You will find useful information and shortcuts that will help you customize and run your restaurant.

If you decide you no longer want to run your restaurant, you may offload it by using the "Sell Venue" interaction on the Restaurant Settings panel. Your restaurant's funds will be added to the value of the lot and get refunded to your household. Once you've sold your restaurant, it will continue to run under new management, and you can visit it in the future as a customer!

Each customer will display a rating over their head while at the restaurant. When the meal is finished and the customer leaves this rating will be added into the overall restaurant rating. Work hard to raise the customer's satisfaction.

Food quality, food value, hospitality, speed of food delivery, restaurant ambiance and personal attention from the manager will all impact a customer's rating.

Sims will be happy with low quality food if it is cheap. They will also have no problem paying a high markup for high difficulty dishes cooked well.

Hosts and waiters with high skills will provide better service and put the customers in a better mood. Make sure you also have enough staff to keep the food coming out of the kitchen quickly.

Spend time making your dining room a nice place to eat. It is hard for Sims to enjoy their meal if they have to close their eyes.

You can review details on the restaurant's rating by performing a mouse hover on the star rating or clicking on the View Last Finances/View Shift Summary button. Review the summary of feedback to find out what is going well and what needs improvement.

Customers will enter the restaurant while it is open and there are available dining spots. Your restaurants overall rating, the time of day, and your advertising will determine how many customers stop by. You can also purchase perks that increase the number of customers.

Pay close attention to the icons over the Sim's heads. They will show when the Sims's rating of the restaurant changes and indicate why. If you miss a change, the tool tip on each Sim will show their last bit of feedback.
Since your Sim is the boss, they have to manage their employees. Your Sim can check in on, praise, criticize, send to training, promote or even fire each employee.

Employees have different skills that determine how well they work. Review these on the "Manage Employees" panel. If you can't find the perfect Sim with high skills to hire don't worry. Employees will slowly gain skills over time as they work. The best way to raise their skills quickly is to send them to after work training. Just be prepared to pay for this training.

An employee's satisfaction is raised by being paid appropriately for their skill level, receiving praise from the boss, and getting promoted. Berating your employees, demoting them, or working them for longer than eight hours per shift are just some ways to lower their satisfaction. If they get too upset, don't be surprised when they quit!

Use the "Manage Employees" interaction on the Owned Businesses panel to quickly check the status of your employees. You can view their skills and current pay level, and see how satisfied they are with their employment.\n\nYou can use this panel to give a worthy employee a raise, punish an employee with a demotion, or outright fire a worker who isn't working out.

Running a restaurant is no piece of cake, but fortunately you can hire employees to offload some work. Select "Manage Employees" on your Owned Businesses panel to view a list of Sims to hire. Review their skills and their starting pay to determine if they're a good match for your restaurant. If you don't like the list of applicants, simply try again later.
As your restaurant becomes more successful, you can unlock the perks to hire additional employees using your Perk points. See the "Restaurant - Perks" lesson for more details.

As a restaurant owner, your restaurant's funds are tracked separately from your normal household funds. Each restaurant that you own has its own separate funds that are used to cover the restaurant's expenses. When you visit your restaurant, you can simultaneously view your restaurant's funds in the Owned Businesses panel in the bottom right corner, along with your household's funds in the bottom left corner.

At any time you can use the Venue Funds Transfer button near your household's Simoleons in the bottom left corner to move money between your household and any of the restaurants that you own. Within this panel you can select the account you're transferring from and to, and enter the amount of money you want to transfer. Try transferring funds when you need more money to pay your business' expenses, or to send the profits from your business back to your household.

You can click on the "View Shift Summary/Last Finances" button on the Owned Businesses panel to get a detailed breakdown of your profits and expenses. Use this information to make strategic decisions about your restaurant to help maximize profits.

There's a chance that your restaurant can go into debt if you don't have enough money to pay your employees, or if you purchase advertising while low on funds. If your restaurant doesn't have enough money to pay its debts, you won't be allowed to reopen your restaurant until those debts have been cleared. Transfer money from your household to your restaurant to cover your debts.

Every action taken as an owner while at your restaurant uses money from your business' funds. This includes building on the restaurant lot, placing objects, paying your employees, purchasing advertising, and more. When you enter Build Mode, the money shown in the bottom left corner will switch to display your restaurant funds that you're building with. Finally, any money you can from your restaurant's sales will be deposited into your restaurant funds.

Restaurant Perks have a direct impact on your restaurant and your household’s Sims that you’re playing. Employees that you hire are not affected by the Perks. Instead employees can be improved separately by building their skills at various tasks. You can learn more about that in the “Restaurant - Employees” lesson.

Earning Perk Points is simple - just have your Sims help out around the restaurant. Interacting with customers and managing employees will all provide some Perk Points. The more customers that come to the restaurant the more points you can earn. Employees will not earn Perk Points for you, so get to work!

Some Perks provide a temporary bonus, such as the ability to get a discount on ingredients for your meals or a influx of extra customers. You can return to purchase these Perks again in the future once your original purchase runs out.

Perks are the key to building bigger, more efficient restaurants. They will allow you to make your restaurant more profitable and popular. Do not let them go unspent.\n\nThere are a wide variety of Perks to choose from. You can unlock the ability to hire additional employees. Spend Perk points to get a short term or permanent discount on ingredients. Learn how to recommend more expensive dishes to customers. There are even powerful bonuses that influence your customers to tolerate longer wait times or eat their meals faster. Perks that are purchased will be applied to every restaurant your household owns.

Owners of restaurants can earn Perk Points from running their restaurant.\n\nPlayers can use those Perk Points to buy Perks, which in turn, make the restaurant more effective. You’ll find the various Perks within the Owned Businesses panel in the bottom right corner of the screen.

A restaurant is a great place to grab a bite to eat while socializing with friends. Leave the cooking, and the dishes, to the professionals. Head to your favorite Burger Joint, or go for something a little more Experimental at one of the fine dining restaurants.
If you want to get the best seat in the house you need to talk to the restaurant host. Find the host station or host and click on them to Request a Table.
After your first course you can order another course or pay your bill and head home.

The food is why your Sim is here. Click on the table to Order for Table and call over the waiter. Make sure to check out the Chef's Choice for a discounted dish. Confirm your food selection for each member of your dinner party.
Spend time with us! Share a good meal!
Come taste all the dishes! I hear the Chef is amazing!
Come indulge your tastebuds! You know you really want to go!

Chez Llama is the ultimate culinary destination for your Sims. Dress up and try the Chef's latests experimental creations. \nYou can find it and other restaurants in the "My Library" tab in the Gallery.
The Restaurant is a great place to grab a bite to eat!
Hey! You left without paying your bill of {0.Money}, but looks like you're a little down on your luck, so don't worry about it. It's a free meal on us!
Hey! You left without paying your bill of {0.Money} so we charged you. Don't forget next time!
